HeaderOne.location: to the top of the container

ModeToggler.location: to the right of the SearchBar

ToggleBtn.location: to the right of the ModeToggler button

NotificationPopup.description: opens on first toggle button clicked

MassagePopup.description: opens on second toggle button clicked

StorePopUp.description: opens on third toggle button clicked

Author.location: to the right of the ToggleBtn
Author.description: opens the popup containing user basic information

ProfilePopup.description: opens a dropdown of some navs

HeaderTwo.location: to the top of the page

ResProfilePopup.location: to the right in the container

Sidebar.location: to the left of the page, fixed
Sidebar.description: collapsible, to the left, on toggled

menuItems.description: list of menus in column that contains svg followed by menu in a flexed container

SidebarV2.location: to the left of the page, fixed
SidebarV2.description: collapsible, to the right, on toggled
SidebarV2.children: svg of the menus in smaller screen and when toggled

Inbox.location: below the header, to the right of the SideBar
Inbox.description: holding the main components of the page

ChatBoxLeftBar.location: left side of the inbox container
ChatBoxLeftBar.description: contains all messages and pinned messages with search input

SidebarHeader.description: containes a search input  and heading with icon

PinnedMassages.description: it is a container and contains pinned messages and heading

PinnedMassage.description: list type contains the username,image and message

AllMessages.location: below PinnedMassages and contains all messages

PinnedMassage.description: list type contains the username,image and message

AllMessageRes.description: displays group of messages with images

Sender.description: list item container the user details

ConversionsHeader.description: container that contains user image and username

Conversion.location: contains the messages, using the self argument checks whether it is users message or not
Conversion.description: container that contains all the messages

Typing.description: contains the user name and image who is typing

Profile.location: right side, open only when there is a state change
Profile.description: it is a drawer that opens up from the right side contains all the info about the
